title: Relational Contracting and Construction Project Learning: In-Depth Analysis Based on Nordic Cases

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of construction project management and contract methodologies
context.additional_context: Comprehensive summative assessment focusing on practical application in asynchronous learning within BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three limitations of traditional contract methods through case analysis of relational contracts in Nordic countries
Learners can evaluate the legitimacy formation mechanism of relational contracts from at least two theoretical perspectives using literature analysis methods
Learners can diagnose success/failure factors of relational contracts in five dimensions based on actual project cases and propose improvement plans
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
